definition: to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
the way of one's conduct and interaction in society (idiom)

sentences.english: Fourth, the traditional social philosophy is pluralistic in its values.
sentences.chinese: 传统处世哲学在价值层面呈现著多元取向。

sentences.english: My life is very simple low-key man Frank Gao Biao in real good.
sentences.chinese: 我的生存法很简单高标处世低调做人坦诚真实多好啊。

sentences.english: The essence of French savoir-vivre is simplicity.
sentences.chinese: 法国人的处世之道的实质就是淳朴。

sentences.english: He was a philosopher, full of little sayings and homilies about the ways of the world.
sentences.chinese: 他是哲学家，满口关于处世的要言妙道。

sentences.english: “But you know both God and how he works, ” Jesus says.
sentences.chinese: “但是你既知道也知道他的处世之道，”耶稣说。

sentences.english: Street Smarts was written by another market wizard Linda B. Raschke.
sentences.chinese: 处世是书面的另一市场向导琳达乙拉舍克。

sentences.english: Youve got to walk the way you think a princess would walk.
sentences.chinese: 你应该像你所想象中的公主那般为人处世。

sentences.english: "The ritual" idea, with the basic life standard.
sentences.chinese: “礼之用，和为贵”更是做人的基本处世准则。

sentences.english: It is not only the best as a matter of priciple , but it is the path of peace and honor.
sentences.chinese: 这不仅是最好的处世之道，更能给带来和睦和尊重。

sentences.english: These philosophical views serve as a guide in life.
sentences.chinese: 这些哲学观点可以作为处世指南。

sentences.english: Representing the self-containedness, self-restraint and the essence of well-balanced tension and relaxation of the oriental culture.
sentences.chinese: 是体现东方文化的内敛，涵养，处世的张弛有度。

sentences.english: If he lacks the confidence or savoir-faire, it is better to rely on correspondence.
sentences.chinese: 如果他缺乏信心或处世，这是更好地依靠书信。

sentences.english: This is the reality of being human and also business.
sentences.chinese: 这也是为人处世和生意人的真实写照。

sentences.english: Five: Sometimes you need to be like a Golden Retriever.
sentences.chinese: 有时你需要像金毛猎犬那样去为人处世。

sentences.english: A man of irreproachable conduct commands the respect of others.
sentences.chinese: 为人处世品行方正的人受人敬佩。

sentences.english: To receive the instruction of wisdom, justice, and judgment, and equity;
sentences.chinese: 使人处世，领受智慧，仁义，公平，正直的训诲。

definition: the way of one's conduct and interaction in society (idiom)
to be of service to others/to help others/benevolent
to conduct oneself/to behave with integrity
to be content with what one is
